product_code: Mi Wi-Fi Range Extender Pro ROUXIAMWIFIPBK
name: xiaomi mi wi-fi range extender pro (black)
description:
Mi Wi-Fi Range Extender Pro connects to your router wirelessly, strengthening and expanding its signal to every corner of the home. Now comes with a 2x2 external antenna to maintain a transmission rate of 300Mbps.

Product Features:
• Two powerful high-gain external antennas give wider coverage and better performance
• Wireless function, make your wireless coverage larger
• Compatible with other brands router
• Comes with a 2 x 2 external antenna to maintain a transmission rate of up to 300Mbps
• Manage your network settings easily with the Xiaomi Mi WiFi APP
• This amplifier will upgrade automatically without any setting
• Plug and play, easy to use

Product Specifications:
• ROM: 2MB
• RAM: 8MB
• Antenna Type: 2 external antennas
• Wireless Standards: IEEE 802.11b/g/n
• Signal Rate: 2.4 GHz, up to 300 Mbps

Package Contents:
• Mi Wi-Fi Range Extender Pro (Black) x1
